item.title: Should You Pay for Github Copilot?
item.description: Unless you’ve been hidden under a rock, you’re likely aware of Copilot - Github’s (or Microsofts) AI pair programmer. It allows you to get help on the code you’re writing by bringing up suggestions through an autocomplete snippets when you begin typing code in your editor. Since it started its free beta back in the summer of last year, it’s been the subject of many developers videos and it’s even played a part in a few of mine.
